text: Orakzai Agency is one of the Federally Administered Tribal Areas of Pakistan. It has a population of 450,000 and an area of 700 square miles. * Central Orakzai Tehsil * Ismailzai Tehsil * Lower Orakzai Tehsil * Upper Orakzai Tehsil Category:Agencies of Federally Administered Tribal Areas
title: Orakzai District
